title: Shop Keepers VO's on SR
body: What has happened to the shop keepers Vo's on SR, i remember riot talking about having them release later in the year after the map SR was updated but they are still not here:/

replies.body: Same thing that happened to Ao Shin, probably

> [{quoted}](name=James Stone,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8rZapwQE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-17T13:01:00.031+0000)
>
> Same thing that happened to Ao Shin, probably

Don't forget poor ol' Omen, who got scrapped in favor of the white-haired terror of low elos: Riven.
The same thing that happened to champions getting updated skin splashes after VUs or reworks.
